languages.text: {n}Все в этих людях — от манеры речи до пугающей грации, с которой они управляются с клинками, заставляет кровь в жилах стынуть. Их немигающий взгляд, их ветхие одеяния, покрытые багровыми пятнами, их хрипловатый шепот... Тревога возникает внутри сама собой. Вы прежде не встречали служителей Императора, подобных этим. Офицеры вокруг шепчутся о доблести ваших гостей с опасливым почтением.{/n}

{n}Everything about these people unsettles you. Their manner of speech and the sinister grace with which they handle their blades is enough to make your blood run cold. You cannot help but feel a growing unease as you witness their tattered, blood-stained clothes, hear their whispered chants, and feel the weight of their cold, impassive stares. They do not look like any servants of the Emperor you have ever met. However, your officers treat them with cautious reverence, and speak about their prowess in whispers of admiration.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Все в этих людях — от манеры речи до пугающей грации, с которой они управляются с клинками, заставляет кровь в жилах стынуть. Их немигающий взгляд, их ветхие одеяния, покрытые багровыми пятнами, их хрипловатый шепот... Тревога возникает внутри сама собой. Вы прежде не встречали служителей Императора, подобных этим. Офицеры вокруг шепчутся о доблести ваших гостей с опасливым почтением.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Everything about these people, from their manner of speech to the sinister gracefulness with which they handle their blades, makes one's blood chill. Their unblinking gazes, their tattered clothes covered in crimson stains, their hoarse whisper... You can't help but feel a rising unease. You've never met servants of the Emperor quite like these. And yet the officers surrounding you keep on whispering about the "holiness" of your guests.{/n}

{n}Everything about these people, from their manner of speech to the sinister gracefulness with which they handle their blades, makes one's blood chill. Their unblinking gazes, their tattered clothes covered in crimson stains, their hoarse whisper... You can't help but feel a rising unease. You've never met servants of the Emperor quite like these. And yet the officers surrounding you keep on whispering about the "holiness" of your guests.{/n}

{n}Everything about these people unsettles you. Their manner of speech and the sinister grace with which they handle their blades is enough to make your blood run cold. You cannot help but feel a growing unease as you witness their tattered, blood-stained clothes, hear their whispered chants, and feel the weight of their cold, impassive stares. They do not look like any servants of the Emperor you have ever met. However, your officers treat them with reverence, and speak about them in awed whispers.{/n}

You cannot help but feel a growing unease as you witness their tattered, blood-stained clothes, hear their whispered chants, and feel the weight of their cold, impassive stares. languages.text: {n}Tout vous perturbe en ces gens : leur façon de parler et la grâce sinistre avec laquelle ils manient leurs armes vous glacent le sang, et leurs vêtements en lambeaux et tachés de sang, leurs chants lugubres et le poids de leur regard froid et impassible vous mettent terriblement mal à l'aise. C'est bien la première fois que vous rencontrez de tels serviteurs de l'Empereur. Vos officiers, en revanche, semblent les traiter avec une révérence prudente et échangent des murmures admiratifs quant à leurs prouesses.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Everything about these people unsettles you. Their manner of speech and the sinister grace with which they handle their blades is enough to make your blood run cold. You cannot help but feel a growing unease as you witness their tattered, blood-stained clothes, hear their whispered chants, and feel the weight of their cold, impassive stares. They do not look like any servants of the Emperor you have ever met. However, your officers treat them with cautious reverence, and speak about their prowess in whispers of admiration.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tout vous perturbe en ces gens : leur façon de parler et la grâce sinistre avec laquelle ils manient leurs armes vous glacent le sang, et leurs vêtements en lambeaux et tachés de sang, leurs chants lugubres et le poids de leur regard froid et impassible vous mettent terriblement mal à l'aise. C'est bien la première fois que vous rencontrez de tels serviteurs de l'Empereur. Vos officiers, en revanche, semblent les traiter avec une révérence prudente et échangent des murmures admiratifs quant à leurs prouesses.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Esta gente te inquieta en todos los aspectos. Su forma de hablar y la gracilidad siniestra con la que manejan sus armas bastan para helarte la sangre. No puedes evitar sentirte alarmad{mf|o|a} al ver sus atuendos andrajosos y ensangrentados, al oír sus cánticos susurrados y al sentir el peso de sus miradas frías e impasibles. No se parecen en nada a ningún sirviente del Emperador que hayas visto antes. Sin embargo, tus oficiales los tratan con un cauteloso respeto y hablan de su poder en murmullos de admiración.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Everything about these people unsettles you. Their manner of speech and the sinister grace with which they handle their blades is enough to make your blood run cold. You cannot help but feel a growing unease as you witness their tattered, blood-stained clothes, hear their whispered chants, and feel the weight of their cold, impassive stares. They do not look like any servants of the Emperor you have ever met. However, your officers treat them with cautious reverence, and speak about their prowess in whispers of admiration.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Esta gente te inquieta en todos los aspectos. Su forma de hablar y la gracilidad siniestra con la que manejan sus armas bastan para helarte la sangre. No puedes evitar sentirte alarmad{mf|o|a} al ver sus atuendos andrajosos y ensangrentados, al oír sus cánticos susurrados y al sentir el peso de sus miradas frías e impasibles. No se parecen en nada a ningún sirviente del Emperador que hayas visto antes. Sin embargo, tus oficiales los tratan con un cauteloso respeto y hablan de su poder en murmullos de admiración.{/n}

languages.text: {n}这些人的方方面面都让你非常不安。无论是他们说话的方式，还是他们挥舞匕首时优雅、残忍的动作，都令你毛骨悚然。你看着他们身上血迹斑斑的褴褛衣物，听着他们低声吟唱的圣歌，感受着他们冷漠而毫无生气的目光，心中的不安越发膨胀。在帝皇的仆人之中，你从来没见过像他们这样的人。然而，你的军官们却对他们满怀敬意，小心翼翼低声谈论着他们，声音中充满了钦佩。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Everything about these people unsettles you. Their manner of speech and the sinister grace with which they handle their blades is enough to make your blood run cold. You cannot help but feel a growing unease as you witness their tattered, blood-stained clothes, hear their whispered chants, and feel the weight of their cold, impassive stares. They do not look like any servants of the Emperor you have ever met. However, your officers treat them with cautious reverence, and speak about their prowess in whispers of admiration.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这些人的方方面面都让你非常不安。无论是他们说话的方式，还是他们挥舞匕首时优雅、残忍的动作，都令你毛骨悚然。你看着他们身上血迹斑斑的褴褛衣物，听着他们低声吟唱的圣歌，感受着他们冷漠而毫无生气的目光，心中的不安越发膨胀。在帝皇的仆人之中，你从来没见过像他们这样的人。然而，你的军官们却对他们满怀敬意，小心翼翼低声谈论着他们，声音中充满了钦佩。{/n}

languages.text: {n}彼らのすべてがあなたをイラつかせる。彼らの喋り方や刃物を扱う不吉な表情を見ていると、血の気が引いてくる。ボロボロで血に染まった服を目の当たりにし、ささやくような詠唱を耳にし、冷たく無表情な視線の重みを感じると、不安が募る。あなたがこれまでに出会った皇帝の召使とは似ても似つかない。しかし、将校たちは彼らを慎重に敬愛の念を持って扱い、畏敬の念を込めてその腕前について話すのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Everything about these people unsettles you. Their manner of speech and the sinister grace with which they handle their blades is enough to make your blood run cold. You cannot help but feel a growing unease as you witness their tattered, blood-stained clothes, hear their whispered chants, and feel the weight of their cold, impassive stares. They do not look like any servants of the Emperor you have ever met. However, your officers treat them with cautious reverence, and speak about their prowess in whispers of admiration.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}彼らのすべてがあなたをイラつかせる。彼らの喋り方や刃物を扱う不吉な表情を見ていると、血の気が引いてくる。ボロボロで血に染まった服を目の当たりにし、ささやくような詠唱を耳にし、冷たく無表情な視線の重みを感じると、不安が募る。あなたがこれまでに出会った皇帝の召使とは似ても似つかない。しかし、将校たちは彼らを慎重に敬愛の念を持って扱い、畏敬の念を込めてその腕前について話すのだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Alles an diesen Leuten beunruhigt dich. Ihre Sprache und die düstere Eleganz, mit der sie ihre Klingen führen, lassen dir das Blut in den Adern gefrieren. Du empfindest ein immer stärker werdendes Unbehagen, wenn du ihre zerfetzten, blutbeschmierten Gewänder siehst, ihren geflüsterten Gesang hörst, das Gewicht ihrer kalten, teilnahmslosen, starren Blicke spürst. Du hast noch nie solche Diener des Imperators gesehen. Doch deine Offiziere behandeln sie mit vorsichtiger Ehrfurcht und flüstern bewundert über sie.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Everything about these people unsettles you. Their manner of speech and the sinister grace with which they handle their blades is enough to make your blood run cold. You cannot help but feel a growing unease as you witness their tattered, blood-stained clothes, hear their whispered chants, and feel the weight of their cold, impassive stares. They do not look like any servants of the Emperor you have ever met. However, your officers treat them with cautious reverence, and speak about their prowess in whispers of admiration.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bu insanlara dair her şey, içini rahatsız ediyor. Konuşma biçimleri ve bıçaklarını ürpertici bir zarafetle tutmaları bile insanı dehşete düşürmeye yetiyor. Yırtık pırtık ve kana bulanmış kıyafetlerini gördükçe, fısıldayarak söyledikleri ilahileri duydukça ve soğuk, ruhsuz bakışlarının ağırlığını hissettikçe ister istemez tedirgin oluyorsun. İmparator'un hiç böyle hizmetkârlarıyla karşılaşmamıştın. Subayların ise onlara temkinli ama saygılı bir şekilde yaklaşıyor ve hünerlerinden bahsederken hayranlıklarını fısıltıyla dile getiriyor.{/n}
